answers.answer: I believe Wilmer Eye Hospital at Johns Hopkins is in Baltimore.  Excellent eye center - try there.MJK MD

question: I have been diagnosed with glaucoma.  I also have cataracts, but was told that they were not large enough for my insurance (Medicare) (BCBS CareFirst) to have them removed.  I have also been told that I am a Type 2 diabetic.  I count carbs and eat healthy to keep from taking medication for diabetes at this writing.  I don't want to lose my sight and know that glaucoma causes blindness if not treated properly.  I would much appreciate the name and address of the best Ophthalmologist in the Baltimore, Maryland that specializes in glaucoma.  Thank you
title: Who is the best doctor to treat glaucoma?
